trans-unit.source: This topics in this document describe how you can use features of the Windows PowerShell® Integrated Scripting Environment (ISE) to be more productive.
trans-unit.target: En los temas de este documento se describe cómo usar las características de Entorno de scripting integrado (ISE) de Windows PowerShell® para ser más productivo.

trans-unit.source: [How to Use Tab Completion in the Script Pane and Console Pane](How-to-Use-Tab-Completion-in-the-Script-Pane-and-Console-Pane.md) Provides the steps to perform tab completion in both the Script Pane and the Console Pane.
trans-unit.target: [Cómo usar la finalización con tabulación en el panel de scripts y en el panel de consola](How-to-Use-Tab-Completion-in-the-Script-Pane-and-Console-Pane.md): proporciona los pasos para llevar a cabo la finalización con tabulación en el panel de scripts y el panel de consola.

trans-unit.source: [How to Create a PowerShell Tab in Windows PowerShell ISE](How-to-Create-a-PowerShell-Tab-in-Windows-PowerShell-ISE.md) Provides the steps to create a Windows PowerShell tab in Windows PowerShell ISE.
trans-unit.target: [Cómo crear una pestaña de PowerShell en Windows PowerShell ISE](How-to-Create-a-PowerShell-Tab-in-Windows-PowerShell-ISE.md): proporciona los pasos para crear una pestaña de Windows PowerShell en Windows PowerShell ISE.

trans-unit.source: [How to Use the Console Pane in the Windows PowerShell ISE](How-to-Use-the-Console-Pane-in-the-Windows-PowerShell-ISE.md) Provides the steps for writing and running commands in the Console Pane.
trans-unit.target: [Cómo usar el panel de consola en Windows PowerShell ISE](How-to-Use-the-Console-Pane-in-the-Windows-PowerShell-ISE.md): proporciona los pasos para escribir y ejecutar comandos en el panel de consola.

trans-unit.source: [How to Write and Run Scripts in the Windows PowerShell ISE](How-to-Write-and-Run-Scripts-in-the-Windows-PowerShell-ISE.md) Provides the steps for writing and running scripts in the Script Pane.
trans-unit.target: [Cómo escribir y ejecutar scripts en Windows PowerShell ISE](How-to-Write-and-Run-Scripts-in-the-Windows-PowerShell-ISE.md): proporciona los pasos para escribir y ejecutar scripts en el panel de scripts.

trans-unit.source: [How to Debug Scripts in Windows PowerShell ISE](How-to-Debug-Scripts-in-Windows-PowerShell-ISE.md) Provides steps for debugging scripts in Windows PowerShell ISE
trans-unit.target: [Cómo depurar scripts en Windows PowerShell ISE](How-to-Debug-Scripts-in-Windows-PowerShell-ISE.md): proporciona los pasos para depurar scripts en Windows PowerShell ISE.

trans-unit.source: [How to Use Profiles in Windows PowerShell ISE](How-to-Use-Profiles-in-Windows-PowerShell-ISE.md) Provides information about and steps for creating and using profiles in Windows PowerShell ISE.
trans-unit.target: [Cómo usar perfiles en Windows PowerShell ISE](How-to-Use-Profiles-in-Windows-PowerShell-ISE.md): proporciona información sobre los pasos para crear y usar perfiles en Windows PowerShell ISE.

trans-unit.source: [Exploring the Windows PowerShell ISE](../../getting-started/fundamental/Exploring-the-Windows-PowerShell-ISE.md) [Accessibility in Windows PowerShell ISE](../../setup/Accessibility-in-Windows-PowerShell-ISE.md) [The Windows PowerShell ISE Scripting Object Model](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/69b047d0-da79-413e-b948-8e45d05d1f85)
trans-unit.target: [Explorar Windows PowerShell ISE](../../getting-started/fundamental/Exploring-the-Windows-PowerShell-ISE.md) [Accesibilidad en Windows PowerShell ISE](../../setup/Accessibility-in-Windows-PowerShell-ISE.md) [El modelo de objetos de scripting de Windows PowerShell ISE](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/69b047d0-da79-413e-b948-8e45d05d1f85)
